attributes.action: Legalise the posession and use of Tasers for personal protection.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Violent crime has become a major source of concern for members of the public, particularly so, because the law does not allow the public to effectively protect themselves from perpetrators of violent acts. The time has come for the law to be changed in favour of law abiding citizens by allowing the public to better protect themselves. To this aim, I call on the government to legalise the possession and use of Tasers for personal protection.
